Go Back Review Name: Brilliant Review Description: Flipkart has always been good at delivery but this time it aced it. Got delivered before expected date of delivery and got installed same day. installation service was good. the engineer did a good job in setting up and guiding through the remote control features. Note - They also perform test run for 15 min to check for any issue. Overall very happy with the product. Nice cooling , no noise, energy efficient. And the best part you can get it for 2 yrs zero % interest EMI.
